pages.text: Sano Allah naga ali atite ankwayikasye masausyo, basi pangali ŵampaka agakungunukule ikaŵeje Jwalakwe, soni naga ansachilile yambone, basi pangali jwampaka awuwusye ukoto Wakwe, akuwuyikasyaga kwa jwansachile mwa achikapolo Ŵakwe, soni Jwalakwe ni Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwachanasa channope

Jilani: “E jenumanja achinaŵandu! Pamasile paim’bichilile yakuona kuumila kwa M’mbuje gwenu, sano jwaajongweche, basi ni kuti akongoka kwakulikamuchisya nsyene, soni jwasochelele, basi ni kuti akusochelela kwakulikonya nsyene, soni une nganimba nkunnolela jwenu”
Soni (salilidwe yanti): “Kuyani yayikuuwulidwa kukwenu, soni pililani mpaka Allah ajilanye, soni Jwalakwe ni Jwambone nnope mu akwilanya (magambo).”
Alif–Lâm–Râ. (Achi ni) Chitabu chagachisidwe chenene ma Ȃya gakwe, kaneka ni kugasalichisya chenene kuumila kwa (Allah) Jwalunda lwakusokoka, Jwakusimanya abali syosope
(Atesile yalakweyi) kuti nkagalagatila ikaŵeje Allah, chisimu une kukwenu kuumila Kukwakwe ndili nkutetela soni nkutagulila abali syakusengwasya

Soni ni kuti mum’bendeje chikululuko M’mbuje gwenu kaneko ni kutenda toba Kukwakwe, chansengwasye ni yakusengwasya yambone kwikanila ndema jekolanjidwe (jakuwila), ni tachimpa (ku Kiyama) nsyene ukoto jwalijose ukoto wakwe, nambo naga nkugalauka, basi chisimu une ngun’jogopela ilagasyo ya Lisiku Lyekulungwa
Kwa Allah ni kwakuujila kwenu, soni Jwalakwe pachindu chilichose aŵele Jwakombola

Manyililani yanti chisimu ŵanganyao akukwinya idali yao kuti an’juŵe Jwalakwe (Allah pakusisa yaili m’mitima mwao), manyililani yanti pandema jaakuliunichilaga nguo syao, Jwalakwe jukumanyililaga yaakusisa ni yaakulosya. Chisimu Jwalakwe ni Nkumanyilila chenene yaili m’mitima
